See also: Mieten

German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈmiːtn̩/, /ˈmiːtən/
  • audio (Germany)
    		(file)
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)

Verb[edit]

mieten (third-person singular simple present mietet, past tense mietete, past participle gemietet, auxiliary haben)

  1. (transitive) to hire, to rent
